project.name: Helios Datalake
project.scope: Unified ELT to Snowflake, dbt modeling, Kafka ingestion

sections.title: Context & Objectives
sections.goal: Understand product vision, business drivers, and current scaling goals for Helios Datalake.
sample_questions: Can you outline the main business objectives driving the Helios Datalake scale phase?
How do these objectives tie to Novereon's mission and values?
What are the key success metrics or KPIs you're tracking at this stage?

sections.title: Architecture & Data Flow
sections.goal: Explore the technical architecture, ELT processes, and integration points with other systems.
sample_questions: Could you walk me through the current ingestion pipeline from Kafka to Snowflake?
How does dbt modeling fit into the data transformation layer?
What are the most critical dependencies on other Novereon projects or external services?

sections.title: Operational Challenges
sections.goal: Identify pain points, incidents, and how runbooks and SLAs are applied.
sample_questions: Have there been any recent incidents where RB-ING-042 was used?
How is SLA-HEL-01 monitored and enforced in daily operations?
What are the common failure modes and how do you mitigate the blast radius?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Understand multi-hop data and service dependencies across Novereon's portfolio.
sample_questions: How does Helios Datalake interact with Quasar Billing for usage metering?
What data contracts or schemas are shared with Nimbus Observability?
Can you describe a scenario where a change in another project impacted Helios?

sections.title: Prioritization & Tradeoffs
sections.goal: Discuss how the Product Owner balances feature requests, technical debt, and compliance.
sample_questions: When faced with a tradeoff between performance optimization and adding new features, how do you decide?
How do regulatory requirements influence your backlog prioritization?
Can you share an example where you deferred a feature to address a compliance gap?

sections.title: Risk Management & Future Plans
sections.goal: Explore anticipated risks, scaling strategies, and long-term roadmap alignment.
sample_questions: What are the biggest risks you foresee in the next 12 months for Helios?
How are you planning to evolve the architecture to handle higher data volumes?
Are there any planned RFCs that will significantly change current operations?
